metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19200 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in uriparser before 0.9.0. UriCommon.c allows attempted operations on NULL input via a uriResetUri* function. It was discovered that uriparser mishandled certain input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause uriparser to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: uriparser package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.3-2').
